document.full_text: ford motor co  will idle its auto plant in genk, belgium, for five days starting april 4, to conserve parts following the earthquake and nuclear crisis in japan that has disrupted supplies for numerous automakers.
document.title: ford to idle belgian plant to conserve parts
lines_and_colors: ford motor co  will idle its auto plant in genk, belgium, for five days starting april 4, to conserve parts following the earthquake and nuclear crisis in japan that has disrupted supplies for numerous automakers.
